title: [娱乐|综合]SimplePets —— 一款超多功能的免费宠物插件丨更新V4.0 [1.8-1.12]
author: 12312311a

replies.author: 乔柚
replies.txt_content:
标题: [娱乐|综合]SimplePets —— 一款超多功能的免费宠物插件丨更新V4.0 [1.8-1.12] 本帖最后由 longlongz 于 2018-8-27 23:23 编辑 

SimplePets Version 4.0一款免费实用的宠物插件
一、介绍 Intro 这款插件是2-3年前我(作者)为一个服务器设计的。那时候，这款插件只有5-8个宠物。但现在不一样了。这款插件是一款宠物插件，这个插件是一款简单操作，对新人更加友善的插件。
二、功能 Features ·经常更新·有趣好玩·95% 私人化·几乎所有Minecraft中的生物·容易使用·容易配置·宠物骑乘·充满变数的文件更新（一些文件不需要服务器重启/插件重载就能自动更新）·宠物作为帽子·重命名宠物·大更新不断·经常更新，改进代码和玩法·以及更多的东西，你需要使用插件才能找到
三、原文+翻译 Original+Translation [老版翻译]原文在前，翻译在后，如有不当可以修改
NOTE Must have spigot 1.8.8, 1.9.X, 1.10.X, or 1.11.X in order to run the plugin.注意：必须有Spigot 1.8.8， 1.9.x，1.10.x，1.11.x。1.12.x来运行这个插件Requirements:- SimpleAPI (Version: 3.1+)the plugin will not function without the plugin. The SimpleAPI plugin handles a lot of the tasks like [Particles, UpdateNotifications, Clearing pathfinding goals, and much more]- Spigot Version 1.8.8, 1.9, 1.9.4, 1.10, 1.11, or 1.11.2 (Recommended)前置：- SimpleAPI（版本3.1+），如果没有SimpleAPI插件不会起作用，SimpleAPI插件管理了不少的任务，例如粒子效果，升级提示，清理寻找路径的目标等等- 建议Spigot版本 1.8.8，1.9，1.9.4，1.10，1.11或1.11.2Current petsBat, Blaze, Chicken, Cow, Creeper, Enderman, Endermite, Ghast, Giant, Horse, IrongGolem, Mooshroom, Ocelot, Pig, Pigman, Rabbit, Sheep, Silverfish, Skeleton, Snowman, Spider, Squid, Villager, Wither Wolf, Witch, Zombie, and many more mobs!!现有的宠物:蝙蝠，烈焰人，鸡，牛，爬行者，末影人，末影螨，恶魂，僵尸巨人，马，铁傀儡，蘑菇牛，豹猫，猪，僵尸猪人，兔子，羊，蠹虫，骷髅，雪傀儡，蜘蛛，章鱼，村民，，女巫，僵尸以及更多的生物！What is SimplePets?SimplePets是什么？SimplePets was first started around 2-3 years ago on a server I develop for (CatsCraft). At the time, SimplePets only consisted of 5-8 pets. But now enough of the Back story. SimplePets is a companion/pets plugin, The plugin was originally created to be an Easy-to-use more user Friendly Alternative to the now discontinued EchoPets plugin.SimplePets插件是在2-3年前我为一个服务器（CatsCraft）制作的。那时的SimplePets只由5-8个宠物组成，但是往事已经过去，SimplePets是一个伙伴/宠物插件，这个插件与一个不再更新的EchoPets插件相比更加简单，更加方便玩家使用Features:特点：Always Updated经常更新Funny at times有趣好玩95% customization95% 定制Almost all the possible mobs in Minecraft几乎所有Minecraft中的生物Easy to use容易使用Easy to setup容易配置Pet Riding宠物骑乘Dynamic File Updating (Certain Files Update automatically WITHOUT Restarts/Reloads)充满变数的文件更新（一些文件不需要服务器重启/插件重载就能自动更新）Pet Hats宠物作为帽子Pet Renaming重命名宠物Constant Big Updates大更新不断ALWAYS Upgrading and improving code and play Style经常更新，改进代码和玩法And many more, but hey you have to try the plugin to find them out.以及更多的东西，你需要使用插件才能找到How to install如何安装- Download SimplePets.jar- 下载SimplePets.jar- Upload/move plugin to your servers plugins folder- 上传/移动插件到你的服务器的插件文件夹- restart/reload server.- 重启服务器/重载服务器插件- edit the configurations to your liking- 依据你的喜好来更改配置文件How can I contact you?如何联系作者？- Skype I always have skype open: live:starwars4393- Skype 作者总是保持Skype的开启: liveLstarwars4393- Email: briansnyder498@gmail.com- 邮件：briansnyder498@gmail.com- Spigot: sending me a pm, review, or any other form of notification- Spigot: 给作者发一个消息,反馈，或者其他类型的提醒Commands指令：/pet - Opens the pet selection menu/pet - 打开宠物选择菜单/pet menu - Opens the pet selection menu/pet menu - 打开宠物选择菜单/pet help - Show help on plugin commands/pet help - 显示插件的指令帮助/pet ride - Ride your pet (Added in 2.9)/pet ride - 骑乘你的宠物 (在2.9加入)/pet hat - Set your pet on/off your head (Added in 2.9)/pet hat - 设置你的宠物在/不在你的帽子上(在2.9加入)/pet list - Lists all the pets available in your server version (Added in 2.8)/pet list - 显示在服务器版本内支持的所有宠物种类(在2.8加入)/pet remove [player] - Remove your pet or an others/pet remove [玩家名称] - 删除你的/别人的宠物 /pet summon <pet> <player> - Spawns a pet for the player or selected player./pet summon <宠物> <玩家名称> - 为当前/指定玩家生成宠物Update Plans:更新计划：- Allow server owners to design the menu if they choose so- 允许服务器管理员设计菜单（如果她们乐意的话）- Certain pets attack players attacker- 一些攻击伤害宠物拥有者玩家的宠物- Vault support (to make it so pets can be purchased ) (Will add VERY soon)- 经济插件Vault的支持（使宠物可被交易）（会在最近添加）- Post a review or send me a PM of what you want to see added/fixed- 写一个反馈/私信如果你想要添加功能/修复bugNeed to know some more information go to http://pluginwiki.tk/plugins/?plugin=SimplePets to learn more!!如果想知道更多有关插件的信息请去http://pluginwiki.tk/plugins/?plugin=SimplePets
四、视频 Videohttp://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMjY2MjUyMzQ0OA==.html
五、教程 Tutorial开启/关闭宠物骑乘打开SimplePets插件文件夹打开PetTranslator.yml文件找到你想要开启/关闭骑乘的宠物改变Mount处的变量为false(关闭骑乘)或true(开启骑乘)改变行走速度打开SimplePets插件文件夹打开PetTranslator.yml文件找到你想要更改的宠物改变WalkSpeed处的变量为你想要的小数注意：接近整数意味着非常非常快，我会尝试将数字保持在0.7以下开启/关闭宠物命名打开SimplePets插件文件夹打开config.yml文本改变PlayerPetNaming处变量为false(关闭改名)或true(开启改名)
六、权限 Permission-Pet.snowman - Allows players to access the snowman pet 允许玩家与宠物雪傀儡互动 - Pet.rabbit - Allows players to access the rabbit pet 允许玩家与宠物兔子互动 - Pet.cow - Allows players to access the cow pet  允许玩家与宠物牛互动 - Pet.pig - Allows players to access the pig pet  允许玩家与宠物猪互动 - Pet.blaze - Allows players to access the blaze pet  允许玩家与宠物烈焰人互动 - Pet.pigman - Allows players to access the pigman pet  允许玩家与宠物僵尸猪人互动 - Pet.mooshroom - Allows players to access the mooshroom pet  允许玩家与宠物蘑菇牛互动 - Pet.chicken- Allows players to access the chicken pet  允许玩家与宠物鸡互动 - Pet.irongolem - Allows players to access the irongolem pet  允许玩家与宠物铁傀儡互动 - Pet.sheep - Allows players to access the sheep pet  允许玩家与宠物羊互动 - Pet.wolf - Allows players to access the wolf pet  允许玩家与狼宠物互动  - Pet.villager - Allows players to access the villager pet  允许玩家与宠物村民互动 - Pet.zombie- Allows players to access the zombie pet  允许玩家与宠物僵尸互动 - Pet.spider- Allows players to access the spider pet  允许玩家与宠物蜘蛛互动 - Pet.enderman- Allows players to access the enderman pet  允许玩家与宠物末影人互动 - Pet.skeleton- Allows players to access the skeleton pet  允许玩家与宠物骷髅互动 - Pet.wither- Allows players to access the wither pet  允许玩家与宠物凋零互动 - Pet.creeper- Allows players to access the creeper pet  允许玩家与宠物爬行者互动 - Pet.horse - Allows players to access the horse pet  允许玩家与宠物马互动 - Pet.ocelot - Allows players to access the ocelot pet  允许玩家与宠物豹猫互动 - Pet.squid - Allows players to access the squid pet  允许玩家与宠物鱿鱼互动 - Pet.endermite - Allows players to access the endermite pet  允许玩家与宠物末影螨互动 - Pet.giant - Allows players to access the giant pet  允许玩家与宠物僵尸巨人互动 - Pet.ghast - Allows players to access the ghast pet  允许玩家与宠物恶魂互动 - Pet.witch - Allows players to access the witch pet  允许玩家与宠物女巫互动 - Pet.bat - Allows players to access the bat pet  允许玩家与宠物蝙蝠互动 - Pet.PetToHat - gives user permission to put their pet as a hat  给予玩家将宠物放在头上作为帽子的权限 - Pet.PetToMount- gives user permission to ride/control their pet  给予玩家骑乘/控制他们的宠物的权限
 - Pet.summon- gives user permission to the pet summon command  给予玩家召唤宠物的权限 - Pet.help- gives user permission to the pet help command  给予玩家有关宠物帮助指令的权限
 - Pet.* - gives all permissions to the plugin  给予插件全部的权限 - Pet.commands.* - gives all permissions to the plugin commands  给予插件所有与指令有关的权限 - Pet.types.* - gives all permissions to pets  给予所有有关宠物的权限 - Pet.passive- gives user permission to all passive pets  给予所有有关非攻击性宠物的权限 - Pet.hostile- gives user permission to all the hostile pets  给予所有有关攻击性宠物的权限
七、指令 Command/pet - 打开宠物选择菜单/pet menu - 打开宠物选择菜单/pet help - 显示插件的指令帮助/pet ride - 骑乘你的宠物 (在2.9加入)/pet hat - 设置你的宠物在/不在你的帽子上(在2.9加入)/pet list - 显示在服务器版本内支持的所有宠物种类(在2.8加入)/pet remove [玩家名称] - 删除你的/别人的宠物 /pet summon <宠物> <玩家名称> - 为当前/指定玩家生成宠物
八、配置 Configuration Version1.0汉化  [该配置可能已过期]Config.yml
# ---------------------------------------------------- ## ----             感谢下载SimplePets插件！         ---- ## ----               需要此插件的更多信息？          ---- ## ----      请在skype上联系作者： live:starwars4393 ---- ## ----               或者在spigot上联系他           ---- ## ----                需要插件的更多文本？           ---- ## ----                 请查看以下的链接             ---- ##   链接1：http://pluginwiki.tk/plugins/?plugin=SimplePets# ---------------------------------------------------- #
# 允许玩家给宠物命名PlayerPetNaming: false
# 当世界改变时玩家拥有的宠物是否会被删除？RemovePetsOnWorldChange: false
# 当一个玩家重命名/删除他的宠物时显示粒子效果ShowParticles: true
# 优先于WorldGuard和其他插件Complete-Mobspawning-Deny-Bypass: true
# 如果玩家没有宠物的权限物品不会显示Remove-Item-If-No-Permission: true
# 玩家是否被允许你在宠物名称内使用颜色代码&k？Use&k: false
# 玩家是否被允许在他们的宠物名称中使用颜色代码&？ColorCodes: true

Message.yml

## 在信息前自动添加。Prefix: "&eSimplePets &6>> &7"
No-Permission: "&c你没有权限！"Unknown-Command: "未知SimplePets插件指令。"Player-Not-Found: "%player% 不存在。"
## 当/pet remove指令被输入时显示的信息。Pet-Remove-Self-Removed: "你的宠物已被删除！"Pet-Remove-Self-No-Pet: "你没有一个可以删除的宠物！"Pet-Remove-Other-Remover: "%player%的宠物被成功删除！"Pet-Remove-Other-Target: "%player%删除了你的宠物！"Pet-Remove-Other-No-Pet: "%player%没有一个可以删除的宠物！"
## 当/pet summon指令被输入时显示的信息。Invalid-PetType: "错误的宠物类型！"No-Pet-Permission: "&c你没有这个宠物的权限！"Select-Pet: "你选择了宠物%pet%。"Select-Pet-Other: "%player%为你强制选择了%pet%。"Select-Pet-Sender: "你设定了%player%的宠物为%pet%。"Other-No-Pet-Permission: "%player%没有这个宠物的权限！"Type-Not-Supported: "此版本不支持这个宠物类型！"Type-Not-Enabled: "这个宠物类型未启用！"
# 当你的宠物名字改变时显示的信息.Pet-Name-Changed: "&7你的宠物名已更改为：&c%petname%！"

## 菜单信息。Menu-Name: "&a&l选择一个宠物："Hat:  Set-Hat: "&e&l设定宠物为帽子。"  Remove-Hat: "&e&l从帽子处移除了宠物。"Mount-Pet: "&e&l骑乘你的宠物。"Remove-Pet: "&4&l删除宠物。"Name-Pet: "&a&l命名宠物。"

Plugin.yml [请勿修改 会导致报错]

simplepet]permissions:    Pet.*:        default: false        children:            Pet.types.*: true            Pet.name.*: true            Pet.PetToMount: true            Pet.PetToHat: true            Pet.reload: true    Pet.commands.*:        default: false        children:            Pet.summon: true            Pet.help: true            Pet.list: true    Pet.types.*:        default: false     Pet.skeletonhorse: true    Pet.hostile:        default: false        children:            Pet.blaze: true            Pet.creeper: true            Pet.enderman: true            Pet.pigman: true Permission.yml [请勿修改 会导致报错]

# DO NOT EDIT WILL NOT EFFECT PLUGIN THIS IS FOR YOUR USE TO SEE THE PERMISSIONS!
 - Pet.snowman - Allows players to access the snowman pet - Pet.rabbit - Allows players to access the rabbit pet - Pet.cow - Allows players to access the cow pet - Pet.pig - Allows players to access the pig pet - Pet.blaze - Allows players to access the blaze pet - Pet.pigman - Allows players to access the pigman pet - Pet.mooshroom - Allows players to access the mooshroom pet - Pet.chicken- Allows players to access the chicken pet - Pet.irongolem - Allows players to access the irongolem pet - Pet.sheep - Allows players to access the sheep pet - Pet.wolf - Allows players to access the wolf pet - Pet.villager - Allows players to access the villager pet - Pet.zombie- Allows players to access the zombie pet - Pet.spider- Allows players to access the spider pet - Pet.enderman- Allows players to access the enderman pet - Pet.skeleton- Allows players to access the skeleton pet - Pet.wither- Allows players to access the wither pet - Pet.creeper- Allows players to access the creeper pet - Pet.horse - Allows players to access the horse pet - Pet.ocelot - Allows players to access the ocelot pet - Pet.squid - Allows players to access the squid pet - Pet.endermite - Allows players to access the endermite pet - Pet.giant - Allows players to access the giant pet - Pet.ghast - Allows players to access the ghast pet - Pet.witch - Allows players to access the witch pet - Pet.bat - Allows players to access the bat pet - Pet.PetToHat - gives user permission to put their pet as a hat - Pet.PetToMount- gives user permission to ride/control their pet
 - Pet.summon- gives user permission to the pet summon command - Pet.help- gives user permission to the pet help command
 - Pet.* - gives all permissions to the plugin - Pet.commands.* - gives all permissions to the plugin commands - Pet.types.* - gives all permissions to pets - Pet.passive- gives user permission to all passive pets - Pet.hostile- gives user permission to all the hostile pets

十一、更新日志 UpdatesVersion 3.1.5
Fixed:
- Fixed a small issue with the ClearPathFinders
Version 3.1
I'm going to start this Update with the Fixes because the new big Addition is AWESOME!!!

Fixed:
- Citizens and other plugins that didn't work with SimplePets SHOULD work now..... BUT it comes at a downfall a little bit..... If a player joins AFTER you summoned your pet, that player that just joined will not be able to see your pet (Optical Glitch, is fixed when the pet is re-summoned.)
- FINALLY got the Saddle item to work with the Pig (Tested on 1.11.2/1.11)
- Pet names are fixed (Would be put back to the default after the pet is removes/spawned)
- I have also fixed the "Remove on World Change" Config value, and will work with the new WorldChange code.
- I have also fixed the small issue with the "Pet.types.*" Permission not working.
- Fixed and issue when the plugin is disabling due to the Registration and Unregistering of mobs.

Now its time for the big new feature.....

Added:
- WitherSkeleton Pet......... (Oh I'm sorry.... did you expect something BIGGER than that?)
Maybe this is what i was talking about ;)- I have added an ItemStorage system to SimplePets. This allows a player to store items in the new menu, to open the new menu you can type "/pet inv" or "/pet inv [player] (Requires the "Pet.inv.other" Permission)", It can also be opened from the PetData Menu (Right Clicking your pet), This new feature can be toggled in the Config.yml file.
- Another BIG feature that I am preparing for is the coming of the ImpossaMobs.... Like the Shulker This will be available in a few updates mostly because its not even close to completion but the Concept DOES work for the Pet somewhat.... Once i get it working it will be Big new feature


Note: In the next update it will be "subtitled" the 'Spring Cleaning' update because I will be cleaning up the plugin and removing Class files that are not relevant or in use. It will also touch up on some of the features suggested and a long awaited planned feature.
Version 3.0
Added:
- New Permissions regarding the naming of pets ("Pet.name" (Base naming permission), "Pet.name.color" (the Use of Color Codes), "Pet.name.magic" (The use of &k), "Pet.name.*" (Permission to all naming features))
- New PetData Values
- New PetData Menu Feature (Right Click to go to Previous Value, and Left click to go to the next value)
- Due to a Mojang bug with horses the Riding of Horse pets have been disabled (Can be Toggled in the Messages.yml file)
- due to the Pig Pet Data having an Error, I have made it so that if the Saddle Item Errors, It will make it say "Has Saddle: ERROR"

Fixed: 
- Fixed an issue when you Teleport the Pet now teleports to you.
- Fixed an issue with Teleporting between worlds
- Fixed an issue when you die the pet does not Teleport to you
- Fixed an issue with the FollowPlayer PathFinderGoal
- Fixed an issue with the "/pet list" command
- Fixed an issue with the PetDataMenu throwing an error when you're trying to open it.
- Fixed an issue with the Pet Item names not changing when you have them customized.
- Fixed an issue with an extra "Pet" was added to the end of the Select-A-Pet message (E.G: "You have selected the Skeleton Pet Pet." now says: "You have selected the Skeleton(Uses the NoColorName Config value) Pet.")

Updated:
- Updated the PetData Display Application (Double Left click the SimplePets.jar file) [Mostly updated the Files and Permissions]
- Did some more checks to see what versions you are using to keep the plugin running and operational.

Version 2.9
Added:
- Economy Support (Two way Buying, One for a One time Purchase and the other is a buy as you select) (Was a LONG awaited feature)
- Blaze is now Flyable (By request)
- PetDataChangeEvent, PetHatEvent, and a PetVehicleEvent
- New command: "/pet hat"
- New command: "/pet ride"
- Ability to Customize the Pet items!!! (Will be made better when I redo the File system) (Was a LONG awaited feature)

Fixed:
- Fixed the Datawatchers for 1.9-1.10 (These versions SHOULD work now without problems, but if there are problems let me know.)

Changes:
- As with any update I do, I changed some stuff with the Pet Following the Player. The Pet will now travel to a random spot around the player, and the pet will only follow the player if the player is 3 blocks away from the pet.
- When changing pets, the pet will no longer be summoned at the players location. Instead it will be summoned at the location of the Old pet and replace it there. To change the Item Material and Durability/Data Simply Open the "PetTranslator.yml" file and change the info of what ever pet you need to (This is a Beta version and WILL change in a later update to be FAR more Customizable.)
- Wolf Collar coloring SHOULD be fixed for lower versions (1.8-1.10)
- I also change the Player File around so that Each player has their own Player File.

NOTICE: Some time soon, there will be File changes. I will be re-doing the File structure to make it better and also Easier to work with and modify.

Version 2.8
Fixed the issue on startup with version 2.8
(I was an idiot and didn't double check my plugin.yml xD)

[size=14.666666984558105px]EDIT: Forgot to mention in the last update, but you can now change the Pet Ride Speed (Inside the PetTranslator.yml)

Version 2.7
Added:
- The JAR file for the Plugin can now double as a little application to load copies of the Default files, Permissions, and also SimplePets Events and APIs
- New Pets command: "/pet list" This commands shows a list of the pets available in your current server version.

Fixed:
- Pets being hats, You are now able to see your pet on your head (1.9+ tbh idk about 1.8 )
- The 1.10 DataWatchers (Should work perfectly on 1.10 now)

Changed:
- Did some small changes to the internal structure of SimplePets.
- Made the Player Files into JSON files, instead of a Single file.

Version 2.6
Notice: If anyone has an updated video for SimplePets (Perferably from 2.6 and up) I would be glad to add it to the video list to update the videos on spigot.

Added:
- Mule Pet
- Zombie Horse Pet
- Skeleton Horse Pet
- Magma Cube Pet
- More Pet Data
- New API (Beta) class: "tk.magnus498.petPlugin.API.PetsPlugin"
- new New events classes: "PetNameChangeEvent", "PetPreSpawnEvent"

Changes:
- Completely redid the PetData Menu (The menu that opens when you right click your pet)
- A lot more was changed

Fixed:
- Fall Damage when on a flying pet
- Pet spawn Glitch (Hopefully, I didn't have any trouble with this in Testing)
- Menu pages would throw an error
- Pets somewhat not working on 1.11
- Page arrow showing on older versions

Any errors Please let me know so I can fix them (Also Note that I do have a long list of stuff that was requested, and I will get around to add them sometime soon)

Version 2.5
I have updated the download link to link to the new site and also away from the no longer available site (brainsynder.tk is gone).

Version 2.4
Fixed:
- SimplePets not working on versions below 1.11 (Even tho it is not wise to be below 1.11)
- Command Issue with "/pet menu"

#Hype The next update will bring more data to the Pet Modifications

Version 2.3
Note: For people wanting the pets to be visible as a hat, just note There is a reason for this feature not being added...

Added:
- Husk Pet
- Stray Pet
- Vex Pet
- Llama Pet
- Evoker Pet
- Vindicator Pet
- 1.11 support (Thanks to Borlea for helping with the Pet Registering for 1.11)
- Tame menu for Tamable mobs
- Polar Bear standing mod
- Wither Shield mod
- Vex Powered mod
- Config tag to toggle Flyable pets from flying

Fixed:

Version 2.2
Note: I will be stopping work on the lower version of SimplePets (1.8-1.9) I will be however continuing with 1.10 and adding new mobs I have alot of plans I want to get in this plugin So expect more updates 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sorry for the long wait for a fix but I had IRL...

Version 2.1
Hey guys, I know you guys are waiting for an update to fix all your favorite mobs. But sadly the Bat pet is working) so no more looking stupid riding on an upside down bat xD.

Fixed:
- Upside down bat  [Tested with 1.10.2]

Temp-Removed (Will remain removed till the bug is fixed):
- Blaze
- Horse
- Ghast
- Enderman

Notice: This update is not to permanently fix the game crashing, this update is a temporary fix the big fix is still to come and will make the plugin work perfectly...

Version 2.0.5
Added:
- Now REQUIRES SimpleAPI
- 1.10 support

Fixed:
- Mobs being removed and not being brought back (Was a "GameBreaking" bug)
- Mobs not spawning in.
- Menu being blank when you opened it.

As always, Let me know of bugs ASAP so I can try and get them fixed. 1.10 mobs will be added very soon.

Version 2.0
Read title!!!

- New message on startup: "SimplePets WARNING >> Using this version is not recomended due to the fact that other mobs will VANISH and will not be able to be brought back. Using this version the bugs as follow have already been reported, please do not re-report: 'My animals are gone', 'Spawners are bugged', 'animals disappear when the chunk unloads', and more involving the mobs/spawners. If you agree to these conditions then go in your config.yml and set PluginUsageEnabled to true, once you set it to true the plugin will be able to load. Thanks for your time, and Using SimplePets - brainsynder"

Version 1.9.5
Any bugs report asap

Added:
- Flyable pets
- Bat pet [Permission: Pet.bat]
- Witch pet [Permission: Pet.witch]
- Pet menu to toggle which opens when you right click your pet
- Console commands
- when you vanish your pet vanishes as well (gm3, vanish and more)

Changed:
- Re-did all the pet code (NMS)
- Pet riding (To allow flyable mounts)

Fixed:
- Pets overriding all mobs.
- Particles not working

Version 1.9
Added:
- Endermite pet [Permission: Pet.endermite]
- Wither pet (again ) [Permission: Pet.wither]
- more permissions to the Permissions.yml

Changed:
- were the NMS is in the plugin.
- how the pets a spawned/created.

Version 1.8.5
Added:
- Ghast pet [Permission: Pet.ghast]

Fixed:
- PetTranslator file resetting
- Pet walking speeds
- NeedsPermission tag

Version 1.8
Added:
- Squid pet [Permission: Pet.squid]
- More mob modifications to the PetTranslator file
- Commands!!! /pet help
- Messages.yml
- PetSpawnEvent and SimplePetEvent

Removed:
- Lang.yml
- A LOT of the petfiles data (moved to PetTranslator file)

Changed:
- PetFiles
- the menu (a little)

Fixed:
- Server version 1.9 pet riding
- Pet names changing default mob names
- A lot of bugs with pet spawning

Version 1.7.5REPORT ALL BUGS AS SOON AS YOU NOTICE THEM SO I CAN FIX THEM ASAP.

Added:
- 1.8 pet mounting (control like a horse)
- 1.9 pet mounting (control like a horse)

Fixed:
- Bug with players switching worlds (Threw error saying can not measure distance between WorldA and WorldB)

Version 1.7
Added:
- 1.8 and 1.9 support for either version.

Fixed:
- permissions bug (my bad was missing a line )
- 1.8 support
- and a few small bugs I noticed while testing.

Waiting:
- Pet riding (I am still working on the pet riding for 1.9 and until I get 1.9 pet riding to work the 1.8 side will not have it either fairs fair )

Version 1.6.5
Fixed:
- Issue with players opening the menu, Error: ExceptionInInitializerError

Version 1.6REPORT ALL BUGS AS SOON AS YOU CAN SO I CAN FIX THEM!
1.8/1.9 compatibility will be available soon for both versions! 
Added:
- New files for changing the pets item name and lore.

Changed:
- Reverted the plugin to the V:1.6 code (might still have the bugs it had then)
- Re-did all the pet classes
- Made the plugin for server version 1.9 (1.8 compatibility will be soon)
- updater and metrics class to the same class...

Version 1.5
Bug fixes!
New code style
Prepared for new features and MORE!!!

Version 1.4
Added:
- Bypass for WorldGuard flag mob-spawning (Long time request!)
- Giant Pet -- "Pet.giant"
Removed:
- All traces of the Ghast pet due to the number of bugs found
Fixed:
- issue with the menu not working.

Any other problems I will still fix. I am not removing the code I'm just creating a different folder in IntelliJ and remaking it. If it is a major bug I will fix it.

Version 1.3
Fixed:
- Pets not removing when players log off
- Ocelot, Wolf, and Horse menus not opening when selected
Added:
-*- Use at your own risk VERY BUGGY but I thought I would let you guys see it -*-
- Ghast pet(Disabled recommended for now until further notice) -- Can be ridden
** Known bugs **
- Ghast pet does not follow player, the pet controlling is VERY off, and others


Changed:
- Small API changes

Version 1.2
Added:
- A pet selector npc (BlackSmith-Villager) it is Enabled by default. Some documentation is on http://brainsynder.x10.mx/SimplePets/wiki/#selector
Fixed:
- The updater spamming the console with NO_UPDATE or stuff like that.

NOTE: If you are using a version of spigot that is not 1.8 the pets will not work due to the way the pets are made.

Version 1.1
Updated:
- new Update checker
- small bug fixes

Version 1.0
Updated:
- Added Metrics
- Fixed the /pet command. Ex: /pet JGFNKDNGKD - would open the old layout.

Version 0.9
Updated:
- New Configuration sections
- New Single page menu
- If pet is disabled (or no permission) & 2Pages is false it wont show the items
- Added new Configuration for the Wither to make it small
- Added a Silverfish pet
- Re-worked the pet naming to prepare for later updates
- When using the Single page layout the Ocelot, Wolf, and horse items open a Different menu to select the type.
- New Permissions: ["Pet.ocelot.open", "Pet.horse.open", "Pet.wolf.open"] (used to open the single pet menus)

Version 0.8
Added:
- Blaze pet -- Permission: ["Pet.blaze"]
- Pigman pet -- Permission: ["Pet.pigman"]
- new config setting to remove pets when changing worlds(off by default)
- Small developer api to manage pets

Changed:
- Remade the pet selector menu

Fixed:
- Update warning error

Still working on:
- the /pet reload problem

Version 0.7
Added:
- Wither pet -- Permission ["Pet.wither"]
- Creeper pet -- Permission ["Pet.creeper"]
- Skeleton pet -- Permission ["Pet.skeleton"]
- Recoded the updater class
- reload command: ["/pet reload"] -- Permission ["Pet.reload"]
- Made it so players don't see the pet when they have it set as a hat
- Pet teleporting has been tweeked
Fixed:
- Updater Fatal Error.
- Spamming error in console
- And some other bug fixes

Version 0.7
Fixed /pet command (Works completely fine on my test server).

Version 0.6Fixed:
- the /pet command

Version 0.5
- Players being hurt while on pets
- Remove Pet glitch/bug when removing your pet
- Fixed the bug were you glitch out if you select a new pet while riding your pet.
- Error that would print when someone new logged on the server.

Version 0.4
Updated made:
- Added a Zombie pet
- Added a Enderman pet
- Added a Spider pet
- Added individual pet configurations
- Changed some configurations (recommended you backup files)
- Added command aliases for /pet
- Added the Permissions ["Pet.spider", "Pet.zombie", and "Pet.enderman"]
- Fixed bug with /pet command

Note: there might be a single bug that will happen to certain pets I am aware of this error but it is not harmful to the server or files I am getting it fixed as we speak.

Version 0.3
- In Addition to the 03 update fixed one of the configuration tags not being generated

Version 0.2
- All pets can be ridden now like a horse
- All pets can be a hat
- New Enderman pet
- New permissions ["Pet.PetToMount" and "Pet.PetToHat"]
- New configuration tags to toggle pet mounting and hat toggling.

Version 0.1
- Added more customization options for owners.
- Added a ShowParticles tag to enable/disable the pet particles.
- Added an Update detector
十二、问题与答案 F&Q我为什么不能看到被戴在头上的宠物？
好吧，这有一个原因。原因就是在我的测试中我发现如果要让宠物变得可见，除非你在第三人称视角，然后第二个原因就是在宠物拥有者的视角中他们只会看见宠物在他们的脑袋上漂浮，使宠物成为了一个帽子。我当然会在将来的某些时候尝试一些测试的性能来修复这个问题，但我不认为这能工作。请记住不是因为你看不见别的玩家就看不见（帽子宠物只是对于宠物拥有者是不可见的）
十三、搬运授权 Authorization
